Who did Taylor Swift recently break up with?
Joe Alwyn
How long were Taylor Swift and Joe Alwyn together?
more than six years
What is the name of Taylor Swift's most recent album?
Midnights
What did Taylor describe 'Midnights' as?
the stories of 13 sleepless nights scattered throughout my life
Which tour was Taylor Swift on when she mentioned feeling 'really connected' to 'Midnights'?
Eras Tour
What is one specific term of endearment Taylor uses in both 'Bejeweled' and 'Paper Rings'?
baby boy
What song on 'Midnights' is believed to reference Joe Alwyn and the early days of their relationship?
Lavender Haze
Which song on 'Midnights' has the lyrics 'He wanted a bride / I was making my own name / Chasing that fame'?
Midnight Rain
Which song on 'Midnights [3am Edition]' mentions Taylor and Joe surviving 'The Great War'?
The Great War
What gesture did Taylor Swift make during her concert while performing 'Delicate'?
a quick thumbs-up
